entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Empty OpenApi schema is generated for type referenced multiple times as generic argument #61194
  • Perf regression: caching, json_middleware #61192
  • Blazor WASM leaves detached nodes #61190
  • RequestHeaderEncodingSelector doesn't default to UTF8 #61189
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.AzureAppServices.SiteExtension missing content/Microsoft.Web.Xdt.Extensions.dll #61187
  • AspNetCoreRuntime.10.0.x64/x86 nupkgs - Missing the aspnetcore shared runtime #61185
  • SignalR uncaught exception in Blazor Webassembly using automatic reconnect #61184
  • Re: [Static web assets] Support watch in static web assets #61183
    Backlog
  • Hot reload broken for CSS changes in Razor class library in .NET 9 (works in .NET 8) #61182
  • Add SRI Hash support to Static Web Assets in Blazor #61180
    Backlog
  • Known Build Error: error : Cannot create a file when that file already exists. #61178
  • Some projects need to add <InterceptorsNamespaces> with the latest aspnet builds #61177

Closed

  • Perf improvement: kestrel-hostheader-mismatch #61171
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #61181
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssemlby.DevServer missing some files #61186
  • Add API to support dyanmically generated OpenAPI schemas in document #60589
    10.0-preview4
  • Include javascript files associated with Blazor components when using MapStaticAssets #59038
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Certain aspnetcore packages not being built by VMR #60146
  • Make it possible to turn of OpenID Connect configuration retrieval, or enable removal of an added authentication handler #61168
  • Dot Net 8+ NotFound behavior #61169
  • Perf regression: fortunes #61163

PullRequests

Created

  • Harden AddValidation check in validations generator #61193
    area-minimal
  • Quarantine `EnhancedNavigationScrollBehavesSameAsBrowserOnBackwardsForwardsAction` #61191
    area-blazor
  • Set PackageProjectUrl #61188
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Do not use Wix targets to sign intermediates #61173
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Harden handling for generic type arguments in source generator #61145
    area-mvc
  • Make default stack size to be 1 MB in base16 #60811
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.4.25174.4 #61134
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [Blazor] Generate Link headers based on StaticWebAssets manifest properties #61166
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] InputBase - SetCurrentValueAsync + SetCurrentValueAsStringAsync (fix for #44105) #54279
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-27
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Dictionary expressions: updates #9264

Merged

  • Queue items with continuing discussion #9238

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Concurrency error in HandleTransactionCompleted (RelationalConnection) #35856
  • Is AddDbContextPool supposed to release contexts from the pool? #35855
  • Cosmos/VectorSearch: Add proper support for vectors into CosmosTestStore.CreateContainersAsync #35854
  • Cosmos/VectorSearch: vector search method translator tries to translate all methods on CosmosDbFunctionsExtensions #35853
  • Cosmos/VectorSearch: add support for vectors on owned types #35852
  • Cosmos/FullTextSearch: add model builder option for default language #35851
    10.0.0

Closed

  • Support a default value for non-nullable properties #21006
    9.0.5
  • Regression from EF Core 8 to 9: MigrationBuilder.DropTable Causes Issues with Subsequent Table Recreation #35162
    9.0.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor property accessors #35857

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [ARM64] With NET7 RC1 installed, some files in the .exe installer and the .zip package are not identical #14279

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid has worse render performance than Blazor Server and WebAssembly #28667
  • Label text gets cropped when a width request is specified on the label inside a VerticalStackLayout #28660
    Backlog
  • Recipe search result page is not showing up properly. #28659
  • I8_Headers_and_Footers-The footer "2019" is displayed in the header position #28658
  • I1_Vertical_list_for_Multiple_Rows - Rotating the simulator would cause clipping on the description text. #28657
  • CollectionView CollectionViewHandler2 doesnt change ItemsLayout on DataTrigger #28656
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Preferences are cleared in debug mode android it works fine in release mode #28654
  • Loading a resource dictionary based on a condition in MAUI8 #28653

Closed

  • .NET 9 - Raise Min iOS supported version to 13.0 or 15.0 #22718
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Windows] WebView Navigated event is still called even after cancelling the Navigation #28303
    .NET 9 SR6
  • TabbedPage: WinUI: Back-button persists when swapping to a Tab that does not have a NavigationPage. #14689
    .NET 9 SR6
  • FlyoutPage IsPresented not updated properly in windows #28440
    .NET 9 SR7
  • .NET Maui Blazor Hybrid App Not Working On Physical Device #28387
  • I cannot have my target framework to net9.0-android35.0 but i could only use net9.0-android . #28651
  • [9.0 SR4 Windows] Publish command creates an MSIX package that works locally but crashes at Microsoft Store #28114

PullRequests

Created

  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #28674
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview4

    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Label text cropping when a width request is specified on the label inside a VerticalStackLayout with specified with request #28661
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion

Merged

    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview3] [ci] Some fixes for dnceng builds #28672
  • [Windows] Fixed BackButton visibility issue when switching tabs without NavigationPage #28371
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Windows] Fix IsPresented property not updating correctly in FlyoutPage #28471
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [tests] Fix ItemImageSourceShouldBeVisible #28665

  • [ci] Some fixes for dnceng builds #28671

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Fixed test case failure 28485 #28644
    area-testing, community ✨

Updated

  • Update CommunityToolkit.Maui & Mvvm reference in template #28510
    p/0, area-templates, .NET 9 SR6
  • [net10.0, Testing] Enabled failed UITests for Switch control due to new OffColor API. #28495

    platform/iOS 🍎, do-not-merge, community ✨, area-controls-general, t/a11y, .NET 9 SR6

    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dictionary expressions: diagnostics from `GetCollectionExpressionApplicableIndexer()` are ignored #77879
  • Dictionary expressions: instance created for `IReadOnlyDictionary<K, V>` target type should be immutable #77878
  • Dictionary expressions: implement nullable analysis for key-value pair elements #77875
  • `FindImplementationForInterfaceMember` incorrectly treats non-virtual public method in metadata as an interface implementation #77874
  • Dictionary expressions: type inference for `K, V` for collections containing key-value pair elements or elements with `KeyValuePair<,>` type #77873
  • Dictionary expressions: add `IOperation` support #77872
  • Dictionary expressions: extend support for key-value pairs to non-dictionary collections of `KeyValuePair<K, V>` #77871
  • Parameter reordering with 'Change Signature' with indented parameters has weird formatting #77869
  • Intellisense autocompletes if((true)){} for unknown reason #77868
  • Collection expression arguments: CollectionBuilder items parameter should be last #77866
  • Dictionary expressions: consider returning a `BoundIndexerAccess` from `GetCollectionExpressionApplicableIndexer()` #77865
  • No longer able to programmatically access `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CodeStyle` diagnostics #77864
  • VB BinaryOperators tests failing on macOS 15 #77861
  • [dotnet-sdk-10.0.100-preview.3.25174.5]Failed to build QuickApp with the error 'The 'interceptors' feature is not enabled in this namespace' after retargeting to .NET 10. #77877

Closed

  • C#: <see cref="FunctionA"/> in regular code comments #71342
  • nameof inconsistency between linux and windows, unbounded generic types #77853
  • GetDeclaredSymbol does not return an appropriate IParameterSymbol on a modern extension ParameterSyntax. #77502
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35927.15 #77863
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.d18initial-10426.05 #77852

PullRequests

Created

  • Detect regular method vs. operator mismatch during overriding and interface implementation #77885
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev17.15' #77884
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WIP: all diag analyzer work. #77881
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Cleanup how we compute and report file-content-load issues. #77880
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: remove PROTOTYPE comments #77876
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revert "Reduce likelihood of needing a dual insertion in VS Code" #77862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: support user-defined and dynamic conversions for expression and spread elements for dictionary target types #77860
    Feature - Dictionary Expressions

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary cancellation of diagnostics requests. #77883
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove unnecessary flag in diagnostics subsystem #77882
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make GlobalOptionService initialization synchronous. #77823
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Another attempt to fix the SDK insertion issue related to runtime/apphost downloads #77845
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge "null conditional assignment" to main #77867
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev17.15' #77870
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Implement support for Semantic Search agent and tool #77784
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support ILogger.BeginScope() for LSP logging #77647
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Workaround issue related to crossgen and specific .NET 9 runtimes #77825
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Null-conditional assignment: Add tests from test plan review #77717
    Area-Compilers, VSCode
  • Null-conditional assignment: Merge in latest main #77856
    Area-Infrastructure, Needs UX Triage
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev17.15' #77857
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Parse ignored directives #77696
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Ignored Directives, Next
  • Ignore file scoped namespace change #77855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge `features/extensions` into `main` #77851
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Next
  • Use file scoped namespaces. #77854
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge 'main' into UserDefinedCompoundAssignment #77858
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Properly classify modern extension methods #77841
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make types sealed in IDE layer. #77849
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Make `Implement with Copilot` light up on member name #77769
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • WIP: ProjectId can't be null with diagnostics #77886
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Razor EA: load from ServiceHubCore #77720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Upgrade to VSSDK.BuildTools 17.14.1043-preview2 #77580
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Generate Documentation - Add loading state #77718
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add build utils to simplify local package sharing #77822
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow modification of source generated documents #77587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support IsActiveDocument in RoslynCodeSearchResult #77311
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update Ngen Priorities for VS #77748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the ProjectDiagnosticAnalyzer type #74353
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • WIP: Remove source generator diagnostic reporting from Workspace #76863
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add stubs for semantic model apis needed by IDE #77448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP Merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures #77707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Switch to using field+auto-prop #76906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IL2067 shown when publishing NativeAOT app with System.ServiceModel.Syndication in use #113990
  • New exception handling on win-x86 #113985
  • Auto-generate parts of the PackageOverrides.txt file #113984
  • [WASM] Why JS interop is so slow? #113979
  • Invalid certificate verification on Mac leading to `The remote certificate is invalid because of errors in the certificate chain: RevocationStatusUnknown` errors` #113971
  • `Marshal.PtrToStructure<>()` Doesn't work for inherited fields #113970
    10.0.0
  • PrincipalContext.Validate() does not handle embedded null characters in username and password as expected #113967
  • [S.T.J] Setting same JsonNode in an JsonArray on same position again throws exception #113966
    Future
  • Unhandled exception from FileConfigurationProvider when re-loading a locked file #113964
  • Publish single exe does not work(wrong folder and not turned into single exe) .NET 9 regression from bug fixed in .NET 8 #113962
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions on 3/24/2025 9:53:02 PM +00:00 #113973
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 6 Regressions on 3/24/2025 4:04:18 PM +00:00 #113974
  • how to analyze the mpld file #113960
    10.0.0
  • Crash in Mono when calling default method on generic interface (DIM) due to uninitialized vtable slot #113958
  • >15,000 redundant and duplicate procedures generated in AOT binary #113955

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Get wasm custom sections inside assembly #112649
  • [Fuzzing] Utf8JsonWriterFuzzer: Memory stream is not expandable. #111588
    10.0.0
  • Regressions from 3-opt #109613
    10.0.0
  • Uninitialized Memory Access Leading from Specific Code Combinations #113959
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `runtime/main` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #113019
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `runtime/main` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #113018
  • Test failure: profiler/elt/slowpatheltenter/slowpatheltenter.cmd #113814
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/unhandled/unhandledTester/unhandledTester.cmd #112846

PullRequests

Created

  • Use ArrayPool in CSTRMarshaler.ConvertToNative #113991
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Extract `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` generation code. #113989
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Draft : Reduce TP regression in allocateRegistersMinimal() #113988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Outbox PbeParameters and PbeEncryptionAlgorithm #113987
    area-System.Security
  • [cDAC] Remove superfluous modifiers from contract interfaces #113983
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Include in WaitingWriteCount the thread that may be waiting in upgradable mode #113982
    area-System.Threading
  • Use the shipping version in PackageOverrides.txt #113981
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix propagating of unhandled exception to native caller #113980
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [perf build] Added possibility to store metadata about latest built PERF build #113978
    perf-pipeline, needs-area-label
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113977
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RuntimeAsync] Move runtime async to the main repo #113976
    new-api-needs-documentation, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • JIT: Remove `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #113975
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix EH and stack walking on linux-x86 #113972
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Test pipeline run #113968
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Don't expose TrustedCertificatesDirectory() and StartNewTlsSessionContext() to NetFx #113963
    area-System.DirectoryServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V] Fused multiply-add #113961
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add CPUID for AvxVnniInt8 and AvxVnniInt16 #113956
    community-contribution, needs-area-label

Merged

  • Fix issue where wrong message was added to EventReporter. #113969
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Disallow loading non-Explicit types with explicit field offsets #113500
    breaking-change, area-VM-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Reduce TP for targets with more than 64 Registers Part 2 : Make operations on fixedRegs less expensive #113713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetFrameName #113769
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix non-portable build for < OpenSSL 3.4 #113965
    area-System.Security
  • Make the eager-enumerator a sealed class #113927

  • [browser] EventPipe - CPU sampling - single thread #113758

  • MLDsa initial OpenSSL based implementation #113764
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0] Test failure - SendAsync_RequestVersion20_ResponseVersion20 #113649

    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 8.0.16
  • ML-KEM: MLKemOpenSsl #113908
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [APX] Make sure KMOV is not encoded in EVEX when JitStressEvexEncoding is set. #113854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix targets for using the NativeAOT runtime pack as the "target ILC" pack #113902
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix CoreclrTestWrapperLib to be robust against exited processes #113937
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • Support Activity Events and Links trace out of proc output #113905
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 10.0.0
  • TypeMap API (Dynamic implementation) #113954
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Fix declared type of custom comparer for MaxBy and MinBy #113944

    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Allow TargetOS and TargetRid to be overridden in DotNetBuild.props #113765
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Optimize ConditionalSelect with const zero when condition is not TYP_MASK #113864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Simple math intrinsics #113689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Stackwalk support for interpreted frames #113900
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Add post-morph profile repair phase #113896
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Check packedsimd first on browser #113743
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [cDAC] Change FrameIdentifiers to be contract literals #113953
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Accelerate long -> floating casts on x86 #113930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactor Sequential/Explicit layout to happen in the same phase where we do Auto layout #113454
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Interpreter GC info stage 2: Generate empty GC info and add baseline implementation of EnumGcRefs #113948
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Adds DAC like entrypoint with new COM interface #113899
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [CI run only] Use funclets and new EH on win-x86 #113576
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [9.0] libnethost no LTCG #113893
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 9.0.x
  • [JIT] Enable conditional chaining for Intel APX #111072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Add some basic tests for SLH-DSA #113766
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enhance logging of stubs through the PerfMap on Linux #113943

  • [browser] event pipe - JavaScript part #110818

  • Do not generate unconstructed EEType for arrays that have a template #113951

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-27

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add `--format json` option to `dotnet new install` #47958
  • Missing VS.Redist.* packages from SDK build #47950
  • No templates list when execute the dotnet new list command #47928
  • .NET 8 lost the availability to change web root content folder when using Web Publishing? #47927

Closed

  • 9.0.100-rc.1: dotnet restore crashes in Docker on linux/arm64 #43405
  • 8.0.401 SDK generates incorrect assemblyVersion deps.json string for referenced projects #43466
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.2xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47594
  • 9.0.200 analyzer regression #47929
  • dotnet-watch content in SDK missing some files #47946
  • Side by side workload manifests with "non standard" semver results in exception string in dotnet --info output #33974
  • APICompat should compare against a framework if it finds an empty folder for that framework. #47925

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixes #44839 to unblock runtime when changes TFMs #47960
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Remove EnableDefenderForLinux 1ES PT feature flag #47959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make it possible to prep other RIDs and architectures #47956
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid crash when no profile contains 'Project' command #47953
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-preview.4.25176.1 #47948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47944
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update baseline #47951
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move the attribute files into the correct folder #47923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update dotnet-watch.csproj #47952
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [StaticWebAssets] Ignore duplicate none items #47949
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add ThreadPoolSpinCount config var #47697
    Area-ILLink
  • Process C# directives in file-based programs #47702
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Move asset validation stage to a template #47954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Fingerprint JS modules #47921
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Don't exclude *.app and *.dmg in .gitignore template #47867
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use hardlinks for preparing the testhost folder #47939
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix sdk msi's relative layout path #47938
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ignore duplicate content items #47940
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview3] Try to update queue to macOS 15 #47931
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.3xx] Try to update queue to macOS 15 #47930
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Try to update queue to macOS 15 #47905
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: "Collection initialization can be simplified" #47886
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update .net10 p2 to p3 in the table #47724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Select the NativeAOT runtime pack as the target package when it's provided as part of the KnownILCompilerPack metadata #46611
    Blocked, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Move generating implicit framework defines to a target. #45696
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update to AwesomeAssertions #47611
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify exit code logic for dotnet test (MTP) and consider no results correctly as "zero tests ran" #47874
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove summary when failing, and double space #47872
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.3xx] light up container publish for all Exe/WinExe projects by default #47691
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Third Party Notices Template to Source Mappings #47058
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix dotnet format failure to handle slnx files #47508
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK, DO NOT MERGE, Branch Lockdown
  • sln-list: Add format options #47618

  • sln-add: Get project DefaultProjectTypeGuid #47661

  • Remove reassignments of `MSBuildAllTargets` property. #47772
